entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
